subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Vince Carter led a 19-0 surge in the third quarter and finished with 20 points as the visiting Orlando Magic beat Boston, 96-89, moving ahead of the Celtics and into second place in the Eastern Conference.
snippet: Vince Carter led a 19-0 surge in the third quarter and finished with 20 points as the visiting Orlando Magic beat Boston, 96-89, moving ahead of the Celtics and into second place in the Eastern Conference.
